channel.title: Missing "eject" package
channel.description:
I've downloaded Whonix-XFCE-16.0.9.0.ova and after importing and running VM, noticed an error in Thunar file manager:
> **Failed to eject "SD CARD".** > Error ejecting /dev/sdb: Error spawning command-line `eject '/dev/sdb'': > Failed to execute child process "eject" (No such file or directory) (g-exec-error-quark, 8).
Installing "eject" package solved the problem. Shouldn't be this small package preinstalled?

item.title: Missing "eject" package
item.dc:creator: nyxnor
item.description:
WojtasJD:

Shouldn’t be this small package preinstalled?

I think the correct way to address this is to make eject be added to the thunar package debian/control file.

Yes, 102 kB is not much… I don’t ever remember having this problem on plain debian so don’t know why this happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing "eject" package
item.dc:creator: WojtasJD
item.description:
I’ve downloaded Whonix-XFCE-16.0.9.0.ova and after importing and running VM, noticed an error in Thunar file manager:

Failed to eject “SD CARD”.
Error ejecting /dev/sdb: Error spawning command-line `eject ‘/dev/sdb’’:
Failed to execute child process “eject” (No such file or directory) (g-exec-error-quark, 8).

Installing “eject” package solved the problem.
Shouldn’t be this small package preinstalled?

Read full topic
